formatted_address: 2 Bayfront Avenue The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands 01-87, Singapore 018972
name: Da Paolo Gastronomia - Marina Bay

reviews.text: Excellent food, environment and view. Tried their curry pasta, it was so packed with flavor. Same goes for the banana cake and small pizza.

Da Paolo Gastronomia at Marina Bay Sands offers a great location with stunning views, making it the perfect spot for people watching. Unfortunately, the food didn‚Äôt live up to the setting. It felt below average, with many dishes seemingly pre-prepared and just heated up when you order. For the quality, the prices are unreasonably high. While the atmosphere is lovely, the food didn‚Äôt justify the cost. It‚Äôs a great place for drinks or a quick snack, but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it for a proper meal.

I absolutely loved this Mint Mocha I had today made by a lovely Indian lady. She was very quick to help me and prepared my drink so quickly it hadn‚Äôt even been 3 minutes ! The latte art was stunning, I will definitely be back for more.

Been here a few times and the service is still as amazing the first time i been here , its amazing with its fast service and cleanliness, everything is well organized , with the staff always ensuring our needs and providing us with the best experience when dining in or taking out
Chilling place and had a great time at this branch. Cecelia barista made a good latte art üëç Will come visit again next time
